description: A collection of circles in a small teardrop-shaped formation with the point pointing toward the bottom right corner of the picture; below the teardrop-shaped formation is a roughly bean-shaped formation above two adjacent rectangular formations, all atop a trapezoidal formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a brown triangle on the left side of the bean-shaped formation and another smaller brown triangle on the right side of the bean-shaped formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
